participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is adventurous and has a creative spirit. She enjoys exploring new hobbies and is often curious about learning new things.
participant_1.background: I love my cats and badminton. I play for the Baltimore Orioles. I've studied ballet all my life. I live in a suburb of Boston. I remember listening to Pearl Jam with my dad in the car.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is upbeat and friendly, often spreading positivity wherever he goes. He has a passion for art and enjoys sharing his creativity with others.
participant_2.background: I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know. I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries. I draw comics. I am a student in social sciences. My favorite color is green.

content.text: My favorite color is green. It is calming and refreshing. What is yours?
I love green too! My favorite is a dark forest green. I grew up in a suburb of Boston and my dad used to play Pearl Jam in the car with me.
That's so cool! I love Pearl Jam too. I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play badminton and watch funny shows. I'm also a student in social sciences and I love to draw comics.
That's so interesting! I've never played badminton before but it looks fun. I love to draw comics too! I'm trying to learn how to play the guitar but I'm not very good at it yet.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar. Maybe we could practice together sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to learn more about badminton too.
